title: DAV 5K Atlanta
text:
Tenth Street and Piedmont Avenue Atlanta, GA 30309 
8:30 a.m. Saturday, Nov. 14, 2015 Categories 
Events, Fundraisers, Sports Join DAV (Disabled American Veterans) to honor our nation's heroes at the DAV 5K Atlanta on November 14, 2015, at 8:30 am! By registering for the race, you will honor the brave men and women who have sacrificed so much to protect our freedoms and help raise funds so that DAV can continue to empower these heroes and their families to lead high-quality lives with respect and dignity. Register today at www.dav5K.org.
